code:
%% Connection flowchart
flowchart TD
  subgraph Client[Security_IntrusionDetection]
    C1[Security_OAuth2]
    C2[Security_ZeroTrust]
    C3[Security_Encryption]
    C4[Security_OAuth2]
    C5[Security_OAuth2]
  end

  subgraph Server[Security_ZeroTrust]
    S1[Security_OAuth2]
    S2{Security_ZeroTrust}
    S3[Security_OAuth2]
    S4[Security_IntrusionDetection]
    S5[Security_Encryption]
    S6[Security_OAuth2]
  end

  C1 --> C2 --> C3 --> S1
  S1 -->|invalid| Drop[Security_ZeroTrust]
  S1 --> S2
  S2 -- yes --> S3 --> S4 --> C5
  S2 -- no --> S5

  C5 -- piggyback --> S1
  C5 -- no_outgoing --> ExplicitACK[Security_ZeroTrust] --> S1
  C4 --> C3

  S6 --> Close[Security_IntrusionDetection]
